alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lorain; Portage; Summit; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 7:11AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect northern Portage... northern Trumbull...Geauga...Cuyahoga...northern Summit...northern Lorain and southern Ashtabula Counties Until 815 AM EST.... At 711 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band along a line extending from near Lorain to Middlefield, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility rapidly dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Snow rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Lorain, Elyria, Parma, Lakewood, Cleveland Heights, Strongsville, Westlake, North Royalton, North Ridgeville, Solon, Avon Lake, Hudson, Twinsburg, Streetsboro, Warrensville Heights, Amherst, Macedonia, Cortland, and South Russell. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. && ODOT DMS 302, 303, 304, 306, 307, 308, 309, 310, 311, 317, 318, 319, 321, 322, 323, 324, 325, 328, and 329.
